name: In-channel ponding/beaver
functionStatement: Wetlands and storage features store floodwater, recharge groundwater, sustain baseflow, and provide low-velocity habitat.
descriptionMarkdown: Small beaver-type impoundments aid baseflow/habitat; no major fragmentation unless historically normal.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Tally beaver dams/ponds per 100 m reach

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Widespread channel fragmentation or overabundant ponding
Criteria: Widespread channel fragmentation or overabundant ponding

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Multiple ponds that moderately disrupt connectivity
Criteria: Multiple ponds that moderately disrupt connectivity

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: One to two small obstructions. Minor impacts
Criteria: One to two small obstructions. Minor impacts

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Beaver dams or small ponds relative to natural capacity
Criteria: Present where expected. Enhance baseflow and habitat. Minimal fragmentation
